amendment.description: To help rural health care providers and hospitals receive a fair reimbursement for services under Medicare by reducing tax cuts regarding dividends.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 595 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 595 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S6201-6204; text: CR S6201-6202) To help rural health care providers and hospitals receive a fair reimbursement for services under Medicare by reducing tax cuts regarding dividends.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 595 proposed by Senator Harkin.
